data.name: The BuildSphere ~ Rise of the Anomalbots
data.detailed_description:
You’re Johnny D, a denizen of a whole new kind of future. As Johnny, you’re a hyper-clever, yet affable hero living in a crazy future where holograms, nanotechnology, and the Net have been melded together to become a single-minded, all-encompassing entity. Meet Artificial Intelligence Manufacturing Entity (AIME), the AI that holds this world together. Sadly, if not predictably, AIME has been infected by an unknown random code, and is wreaking widespread havoc across the land. Bring your best problem-solving skills, a sense of humor, and maybe an extra-large can of WD40 because things are getting a little weird around here. The BuildSphere ~ Rise of the Anomalbots is a unique game of nimble puzzle-solving, contraption-building, platforming challenges, wild adventure and creative exploration.



AIME is having what you might call a bad day. But, like a REALLY bad day. And her breakdown is throwing "normal" right out the window. Bizarre stuff is starting to emerge from BuildSpheres all over the place. What appears to be merely a toaster, your fridge, and, say, an electric shaver one minute, could suddenly be mashed together by AIME resulting in the most oddly threatening device you've ever seen. These mashed-together "Anomalbots" come in infinite shapes, sizes, utilities, levels of threat, ideas of a good time, etc. Rest assured that whatever comes out of the BuildSpheres is going to be something totally random, and unexpected. Like we said, things are getting weird around here, and as AIME's issues continue, it’s only going to get worse.



As this odd world continues to spin out of control, Johnny discovers clues related to the origin of the BuildSpheres which reveal a widening mystery. In order to progress and increase your trove of needed items, you'll need to capture vital puzzle pieces that unlock each level. These provide the information and the tools you’ll need to solve the mystery and be victorious in the climactic final battle with AIME and the Anomalbots.

data.short_description: The BuildSphere ~ Rise of the Anomalbots is a cyber-cool and retro-style, sci-fi scavenger hunt and puzzle solving game with platforming and obstacle course like levels. Each progressive level will challenge you to collect assets and craft your next piece of loot in order to progress in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 9-10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.15.4
  • Processor: Intel i9 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500M
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
